headline: Ask HN: Anyone with ppc64le and s390x boxes to test a Docker image?
description:
I moved my IBM370 VM/370 docker container image to multi-arch but I don’t have a RISCV (or POWER, or s390x) metal running Docker to make sure Hercules starts up correctly.

There is more information on https://hub.docker.com/r/rbanffy/vm370. Platform-specific tags are on https://hub.docker.com/r/rbanffy/vm370/tags and (you shouldn’t trust me and run my container images) the GitHub repo that has the specs is at https://github.com/rbanffy/vm370
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 有没有人有ppc64le和s390x的盒子来测试Docker镜像？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 有沒有人有ppc64le和s390x的盒子來測試Docker鏡像？
description_zh-Hans:
我把我的IBM370 VM/370 docker容器镜像移到了多架构上，但我没有运行Docker的RISCV（或POWER，或s390x）金属来确保Hercules正确启动。

更多信息在https://hub.docker.com/r/rbanffy/vm370。特定平台的标签在https://hub.docker.com/r/rbanffy/vm370/tags，（你不应该相信我并运行我的容器镜像）有规格的GitHub repo在https://github.com/rbanffy/vm370
description_zh-Hant:
我把我的IBM370 VM/370 docker容器鏡像移到了多架構上，但我沒有運行Docker的RISCV（或POWER，或s390x）金屬來確保Hercules正確啟動。

更多信息在https://hub.docker.com/r/rbanffy/vm370。特定平臺的標籤在https://hub.docker.com/r/rbanffy/vm370/tags，（你不應該相信我並運行我的容器鏡像）有規格的GitHub repo在https://github.com/rbanffy/vm370
